backend/main.mo: Actor implementing blob storage, authorization, user profiles, media items, and a love letter template with owner initialization and access controls.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module fixing old deployments by replacing an outdated love letter template with the corrected one if needed.
feature_evidence.json: Placeholder feature evidence report with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Stores prewritten summaries for multiple frontend source files and components.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file loading the client application via main.tsx.
frontend/PRODUCTION_PROMOTION_V25.md: Record of promoting Version 25 to production with no code changes, including verification steps and release mode notes.
frontend/PRODUCTION_PROMOTION.md: Guide explaining the steps required to promote a preview build to production, including verification and build preparation.
frontend/PRODUCTION_SMOKE_TEST_RESULTS_V: Template for recording smoke test results for Version 25 using the production checklist.
frontend/PRODUCTION_SMOKE_TEST.md: Checklist for validating core functionality of the production deployment across welcome, quiz, memories, gallery, and animations.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing page navigation and initializing theme, identity, and query client.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHearts.t: Renders animated floating heart icons with randomized positions and timings.
frontend/src/components/FloatingPetals.t: Displays animated falling petal images using randomized positions and durations.
frontend/src/components/LocalMemoriesPic: Lets users add, preview, remove, and view local or preloaded images with lightbox support.
frontend/src/components/MediaGallery.tsx: Shows uploaded media items with delete, download, preview, and error handling for images and videos.
frontend/src/components/MediaUpload.tsx: Handles authenticated image/video upload with validation, preview, progress tracking, and error messages.
frontend/src/components/MemoryLightbox.t: Simple modal for viewing a single image at full size with a close button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackgroundMusic.ts: Initializes and controls background audio playback for a looping MP3 file.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, identity persistence, and state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating love letters and media via the actor API with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive Valentine-themed light/dark color variables plus base styling rules.
frontend/src/lib/queryClient.ts: Creates a configured QueryClient with default stale time and focus refetch settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CustomizeMessage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a message customization page.
frontend/src/pages/ValentineMessage.tsx: Displays the love letter with fallback handling and an optional memories section with animations.
frontend/src/pages/ValentineQuestion.tsx: Empty placeholder page for a question flow.
frontend/src/pages/ValentineQuiz.tsx: Renders a multi‑question Valentine quiz with animated heart effects and completion callback.
frontend/src/pages/ValentineWelcome.tsx: Shows the animated Valentine welcome screen with floating hearts and a start button that triggers music.
frontend/src/utils/releaseMode.ts: Utilities to sanitize preview URL artifacts and initialize clean release mode on load.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/valentine/loveLetter.ts: Exports the default Valentine love letter text.
frontend/src/valentine/preloadedMemories: Provides a list of default photo asset paths for the memories feature.
frontend/src/valentine/quizData.ts: Defines a QuizQuestion interface and provides an array of Valentine-themed quiz questions with options and correct answer indexes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project state, including issues, architectural notes, and feature history for fixing the Valentine app’s rendering and content problems.
